#Text=Plan and Organize a Family Reunion
#Text=Since the advent of the personal computer and network technology , genealogy research by family members has become an addictive pastime that has contributed to many happy family reunions .
#Text=But what if you were asked to organize the next event ?
#Text=Where would you start ?
#Text=When should you start ?
#Text=Should you hire a family reunion planner , form a reunion committee or do it all yourself ?
#Text=Steps
#Text=Ask for other family members to help with planning activities and choosing the time and place .
#Text=Get the word out - let others know you 're planning a family reunion event .
#Text=Give family members plenty of notice .
#Text=Usually three or four months advance notice will allow attendees to plan vacation time or make adjustments in scheduling .
#Text=Assign each member of your newly formed reunion committee a specific task .

#Text=This could be tasks such as T-shirts and memorabilia , genealogy presentations including memorials and historic tours , entertainment , dining events , Reunion Book , entertainment , photography , etc.
#Text=Give each member written instructions regarding how to execute his or her task .
#Text=Create a time line reminder .
#Text=Make good use of Family Reunion Planner organizers that feature schedulers and time line reminders .
#Text=Make use of Event Planning Software with editable worksheets and templates .
#Text=Schedule the next meeting one or two months away and follow up on all action items .
#Text=Keep the lines of communication wide open .
#Text=Hold each person responsible for their assignment .
#Text=Decide some of the main things that will occur at the reunion .
#Text=For example , you may wish to honor the elders and accomplished members of the family , acknowledge those who are going through something , etc.
#Text=Be sure to encourage each other .
#Text=During the gathering have food and drink available .
#Text=Share stories and anecdotes .
#Text=Do n't gossip or spread rumors ; keep everything positive and friendly .
#Text=Bring lots , and lots of love .
#Text=Even for people you usually clash with !
#Text=Tips
#Text=There are many family reunion planning tools online .

#Text=Make use of planning material that features the following : a time line , preparation reminders , scheduling worksheets , committee assignment sheets , reunion needs lists , meal planners and checklists and T-Shirt Rosters .
#Text=There are many ways to do your family reunion on the cheap .
#Text=You can get free stuff from your local Chamber of Commerce , museums and tourist centers , find free spots to congregate at universities , and get free invitations and eCards online .
#Text=You might like to consider holding a small family gathering to plan and organize a committee for starting annual or regular family reunions .
#Text=It depends on how much effort you wish to put in .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Do n't settle for services simply because they are cheap and local .
#Text=Get recommendations from folks who do not stand to profit .
#Text=Do n't procrastinate .
#Text=Delegate tasks according to skill and competence .
